subtitle.zero: As an individual, when you reach the annual reward amount limited by your tax residency you’ll need to create a dedicated entity
subtitle.one: As an individual, when you reach __count__ USD / year you’ll need to create a dedicated entity.
subtitle.many: As an individual, when you reach __count__ USD / year you’ll need to create a dedicated entity.

company.title: Company
company.subtitle: As an organisation, you are responsible for your statements in your country of residence, and for your coworkers.

selfEmployed.title: Self employed
selfEmployed.subtitle: Being self-employed, you are responsible for your statements in your country of residence.

member.subtitle: As an employee, you can contribute to this company with your rewards.

teamwork.title: Teamwork mode
teamwork.tooltip: Enable teamwork mode if you wish to invite co-workers to manage rewards on their behalf.
teamwork.unswitchable: Remove all your coworkers to switch back to a self employed account.

alert.error: An error occured while switching to teamwork mode.
